channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Tuesday, December 23
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Mark Cuban says AI allows ‘creators to become exponentially more creative,’ but his advice didn’t land well with people working in the industry
item.description: “All you can see is dollar signs and ‘value’ instead of theft, exploitation, and job displacement,” one creative said in response.

item.title: Apple’s Surprise iPhone Upgrade Cancellation: What It Means For Your Phone
item.description: Apple unexpectedly cancelled the iOS 18.7.3 iPhone update, leaving people wondering about what was going on. Here’s what it means.

item.title: ‘Heated Rivalry’ Episode 5 Just Tied Breaking Bad’s Perfect 10 IMDB Score
item.description: Heated Rivalry, the gay hockey drama, has just tied Breaking Bad with the highest scored TV episode ever. You heard that right.

item.title: Meet the Chanel chief who hires for personality over talent or skills—and the 3 red flag traits she rejects
item.description: Exclusive: As Gen Z fights to stand out in one of the most competitive job markets in decades, Chanel says it’s looking for personality hires.

item.title: Trump administration puts offshore wind projects on hold, citing mysterious Pentagon national security warning
item.description: Trump has been hostile to renewable energy, particularly offshore wind, and prioritizes fossil fuels to produce electricity.

item.title: Former U.S. Secret Service agent says bringing your authentic self to work stifles teamwork: ‘You don’t get high performers, you get sloppiness’
item.description: “Could you imagine if I brought my authentic New York self to every interrogation I did?” asked former Secret Service agent Evy Poumpouras.

item.title: Billionaire Larry Ellison comes to his son’s rescue, agreeing to personally guarantee over $40 billion to finance Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros.
item.description: Warner Bros. is in the middle of a tug-of-war between Netflix and David Ellison's company, Paramount Skydance.

item.title: Chimera Bots: AI-Directed Cyberattacks Are A New Class Of Digital Adversaries
item.description: Chimera Bots —AI-driven cyberattack agents integrate automation, machine learning, adaptive malware, and botnet infrastructures into evolving digital ...

item.title: NYT Strands Hints, Spangram, Answers: Tuesday, December 23 (Brrrrr!)
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Strands? An extra hint and the answers are right here to help you finish the grid.

item.title: Economic calendar: Holiday week highlighted by further shutdown-delayed data
Why investors shouldn't give up on a ‘Santa Claus rally’ just yet
U.S. stocks target third straight gain as year-end push continues — live updates
U.S. stock futures rise as investors hold out hope for a Christmas rally
10 of the most loved dividend stocks for 2026 — sporting yields of 4% or more
Trump economist predicts ‘biggest refund cycle ever,’ massive checks ahead
item.description: National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett promises the largest tax refunds in U.S. history as Americans continue to worry about affordability a...

item.title: Americans surge toward financial resolutions for 2026 amid household budget concerns
item.description: More Americans are planning financial resolutions for 2026, with 64% focusing on short-term savings goals amid inflation concerns, up from 56% last ye...

item.title: Mortgage rates slip, sticking near 2025 lows
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.21%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down from...

item.title: Labor secretary downplays warning signs, insists job market is ‘strengthening’ despite rising unemployment
item.description: Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer defends the rising unemployment rate of 4.6% as a positive sign that more Americans are seeking jobs under the Tru...

item.title: Inflation remained elevated in November as Fed considers pausing interest rate cuts
item.description: The Bureau of Labor Statistics released the November consumer price index which showed that CPI inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2%...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
